title: Short Story Finder

embed.description: Welcome to Universe, the definitive source for the world of League of Legends.Here you'll find a vast collection of art and artifacts, like bios chronicling the origins of your favorite champions and landscapes depicting the historic regions they hail from.

body:
With the new universe unleashed and the website in full gear I was hoping you would add a page other then , Explore , Champions , Regions and search. Im hoping you add a slide for all the short story's in an index format.

Before you had lots of short story's in the latest part of the website but sense time has past its full of the Camille story and champion incite. 

Riot , please add a story index to the slide function , it takes so long going through every champion just to read more about the world. You dont know weather or not the champion has any short story's other then there 5 sentences of explanation.

 It would make the site a lot better. 

Thank you

replies.body: This is a great idea! I'll bring it to the team, thanks for the feedback

You got those smarts!

good idea.

Hey another suggestion for the short stories, have links going from one to other related stories. IE: if I'm looking at shadow and fortune it might be nice if there's a link to burning tides. or if you're reading bloodline, a link to Taliyah's color text about going home
Also it would be nice if they are in chronological order, specially for someone like Taliyah whose stories and media go in a certain order.
